about_the_game:
The Gates of Neptune is a deep-sea dungeon adventure!

You are deployed back to planet Earth to recover a meteor-struck escape pod crew. While on your mission you find yourself discovering ancient ruins, new creatures, and ancient powers. The deeper you go, the closer you get to finally solving the mysteries of the most famous lost city. In a future where most of humanity has left Earth for the stars, a research crew was orbiting the blue planet when a meteor storm took them by surprise. After splash landing on Earth, you are deployed in a submersible to recover the crew with the help of your off-planet mate, Miller. During the recovery mission, you encounter ancient text and creatures that seem to be protecting something. But what? Adventure to the deep and you might finally untangle the legends of Atlantis.

 

Features

  • Explore the depths of the seas! Find treasures hidden by time and nature to enhance your arsenal. It’s a pretty big ocean. There’s no telling what you might find.

  • Discover ancient ruins and their secrets. Ancient powers have sealed off something most powerful. Unravel what they hold and why they had to be sealed away.

  • Battle guardians of the deep! Totems of the ancients guard their secrets and will not give them up easily. Abilities gained along the way will help defeat these foes. But just what are they guarding?

  • Traverse enemy filled dungeons! Each guardian is tucked away in a puzzle protected labyrinth. How will you find your way through these mazes of the deep? Gaining tools and abilities will help you find your way through!
